jobDetails.jobDescription: AI Scientist (product R&D)Position OverviewWe are seeking a skilled AI Scientist to join our product-focused AI R&D team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing proof of concepts (PoCs) of new products and features powered by AI. By leveraging cutting-edge AI/ML techniques, you will contribute to the creation of transformative solutions that enhance our product offerings. This is an exceptional opportunity to work on impactful projects within a collaborative and interdisciplinary environment. This is a part-time position (3/5 FTE) , offered under a contract of employment.Key ResponsibilitiesCollaborate on PoCs of AI features and applications.Conduct spike tests on new AI models and tools.Work with technical and non-technical stakeholders.Stay current with AI/ML advancements.Capabilities And SkillsKnowledge of AI/ML areas, tools, and frameworks.Experience with prompt engineering and advance LLM usage techniques. Familiarity with LLM Agents is a plus.Familiarity with public cloud platforms, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.Ability to work in cross-disciplinary teams, promoting collaboration between technical and non-technical members.Analytical and problem-solving skills, with a creative approach to innovation.Proficiency in both English and Polish languages.About PearsonAt Pearson, we’re committed to a world that’s always learning and to our talented team that makes it all possible. From bringing lectures vividly to life to turning textbooks into laptop lessons, we are always reexamining the way people learn best, whether it’s one child in our backyard or an education community across the globe. We are bold thinkers and standout innovators who motivate each other to explore new frontiers in an environment that supports and inspires us to always be better. By pushing the boundaries of technology—and each other to surpass these boundaries—we create seeds of learning that become the catalyst for the world’s innovations, personal and global, large and small.Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe’re committed to equity and opportunity, so that all learners can realise the life they imagine and see themselves in our services and products. We believe learning is a powerful force for change and that diversity, equity and inclusion are fundamental to who we are. We’re committed to addressing all forms of systematic racism, discrimination and inequality in everything we do.We also believe in giving everyone in the company the chance to help shape a more inclusive culture, in which everyone feels a sense of belonging and in which everyone acts with integrity day-in, day-out. To learn more about Pearson’s commitment to a diverse and inclusive workforce, please click here.Pearson is an equal opportunities employer.
